subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James’s 34 points and 12 rebounds led the Cavaliers to a 100-97 victory and a 3-1 lead in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference playoff series.
snippet: LeBron James’s 34 points and 12 rebounds led the Cavaliers to a 100-97 victory and a 3-1 lead in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference playoff series.
